title: Live News Platform
description: Real-time NLP pipeline ingesting 10,000+ daily articles from NYT and Bing APIs with keyword visualization and sentiment analysis
fullDescription: A production-grade NLP pipeline that ingests 10,000+ daily news articles from NYT and Bing Search APIs, applies PySpark-based text cleaning and sentiment analysis, and surfaces results through interactive keyword word clouds linked to source articles.
modalContent:
Status: NJBDA 2025 – Presented | Under Peer Review

Technologies: Python, PySpark, NLP, TextBlob, REST APIs (NYT, Bing), Streamlit, WordCloud, Azure Blob Storage, JSON

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/live-news-platform


Key Achievements:

  • Engineered scalable NLP pipeline processing 10,000+ daily articles from enterprise REST APIs
  • 60% reduction in content delivery time through automated API-to-UI pipeline
  • Integrated Azure Blob Storage for reliable article caching and retrieval
  • PySpark transformations for text cleaning, tokenization, and sentiment scoring at scale
  • Interactive word clouds enabling keyword-driven content discovery for underserved users

title: AQI Routing Maps
description: 1st Prize Data Science Showcase, least-polluted routing system for respiratory patients using Azure Maps and live AQI data, validated across world's most polluted cities
fullDescription: Award-winning geospatial ETL system integrating Azure Maps API and real-time Air Quality Index data to compute least-polluted travel routes for respiratory patients — validated across the world's most polluted cities and presented at NJBDA 2025.
modalContent:
Status: NJBDA 2025 – Presented | 1st Prize – SPU Data Science Showcase 2024

Technologies: Azure Maps API, Azure Data Factory, Python, REST APIs, PySpark, Geospatial Analysis, Real-time AQI Data

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/aqi-routing-maps


Key Achievements:

  • Built real-time geospatial ETL system optimizing health-focused route planning for 200+ facilities
  • Custom least-polluted routing algorithm validated across the world's most polluted cities
  • 60% reduction in data preparation time through automated Azure-based environmental ingestion
  • Integrated live AQI and weather feeds via Azure Data Factory for continuous route updates
  • Demonstrated measurable health risk reduction across 100+ route simulations

title: Metaheuristic Optimization
description: Hybrid ACO + Grid Search framework for breast cancer diagnosis. 15% accuracy gain, 20% faster training, presented at SPU Symposium 2024
fullDescription: Research project engineering a hybrid Ant Colony Optimization and Grid Search framework to optimize logistic regression for breast cancer diagnosis — improving prediction accuracy by 15% and cutting model training time by 20%. Presented at SPU Symposium 2024.
modalContent:
Status: SPU Symposium 2024 – Presented

Technologies: Python, Scikit-learn, PSO, ACO, Hybrid ACO+GridSearchCV, Logistic Regression, Breast Cancer Wisconsin Dataset

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/Optimization-with-Metaheuristic-Optimization


Research Achievements:

  • Hybrid ACO + Grid Search framework improved prediction accuracy by 15% over baseline methods
  • 20% reduction in model training time through optimized regularization parameter search
  • 30% reduction in error rates on the Breast Cancer Wisconsin diagnostic dataset
  • Comparative analysis of PSO, ACO, and Hybrid approaches across multiple evaluation metrics
  • Selected for presentation at Saint Peter's University Research Symposium 2024

title: Text Summarization
description: Benchmarking BART, T5, and PEGASUS for abstractive summarization — evaluating speed, memory, and quality using BERT and cosine similarity
fullDescription: Comprehensive benchmarking study of state-of-the-art abstractive summarization models — BART, T5, and PEGASUS — evaluating execution time, memory footprint, and summary quality using BERT embeddings, Word2Vec, and cosine similarity scoring.
modalContent:
Technologies: BART, T5, PEGASUS, Python, NLP, Cosine Similarity, BERT, Word2Vec, Hugging Face Transformers

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/Text-Summarization


Key Findings:

  • Benchmarked BART, T5, and PEGASUS across speed, memory usage, and output quality
  • BERT embeddings and cosine similarity used for semantic quality scoring beyond standard ROUGE metrics
  • Word2Vec analysis surfaced vocabulary coverage gaps between model outputs and source documents
  • Produced practical model selection guidelines for latency-sensitive vs accuracy-critical applications
  • Findings applicable to real-world NLP pipelines where compute cost and quality must be balanced

title: Heart Disease Dashboard
description: Data Storyteller Award — Tableau dashboard on CDC's 2022 Heart Disease Dataset surfacing actionable health outcome insights
fullDescription: Award-winning Tableau dashboard built on the CDC's 2022 Heart Disease Indicators Dataset — recognized with the Data Storyteller Award for excellence in translating complex health data into clear, actionable visual narratives.
modalContent:
Award: Data Storyteller Award Winner 2024

Technologies: Tableau, CDC 2022 Dataset, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization, Healthcare Analytics

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/data-storyteller-award-dashboard


Key Features:

  • Recognized with the Data Storyteller Award for visualization excellence and communication clarity
  • Interactive multi-view dashboard surfacing heart disease risk factors across demographics
  • Statistical analysis of CDC's 2022 dataset covering 400,000+ survey respondents
  • Designed for non-technical stakeholders — no SQL or code required to extract insights
  • Advanced Tableau techniques including calculated fields, LOD expressions, and dynamic filtering

title: ETL Pipeline Automation
description: Enterprise PySpark + Airflow pipelines processing 200GB+ daily healthcare data on AWS — 35% faster, $1,800/mo saved, 99.5% uptime
fullDescription: Enterprise-grade ETL pipeline system built at Pavane Solutions — orchestrating 50+ Airflow DAGs on AWS EMR and Glue to process 200GB+ of daily healthcare claims into Redshift and Athena, with full data quality monitoring, IaC via Terraform, and containerized deployments on AWS EKS.
modalContent:
Company: Pavane Solutions Inc.

Technologies: PySpark, Apache Airflow, AWS (S3, EMR, Glue, Redshift, Athena, EKS, CloudWatch), Snowflake, dbt, Terraform, Docker, Jenkins


Key Achievements:

  • 200GB+ of daily healthcare claims processed with 99.5% uptime across all production workflows
  • 50+ Airflow DAGs orchestrated with retry logic and SLA monitoring — 40% less manual intervention
  • 35% improvement in processing speed via broadcast joins and dynamic PySpark partitioning
  • $1,800/month saved in AWS EMR costs through job-level optimization on multi-TB datasets
  • Migrated Oracle to Snowflake with dbt-powered incremental ELT and star schema modeling
  • Full data quality framework: CloudWatch alerts for schema drift, null checks, and integrity violations
